recap_documents.description: JOINT STIPULATION ON THE PROTOCOL FOR DISCOVERY OF ELECTRONICALLY-STORED INFORMATION AND HARD COPY DOCUMENTS: To facilitate the exchange of electronically-stored information ("ESI"), documents, and hard copy documents pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 26, Plaintiff Aubrey Drake Graham and Defendant UMG Recordings, Inc. (collectively the "Parties") in the above-captioned action (the "Action"), hereby stipulate to the following protocol for discovery of ESI and hardcopy documents (the "ESI Protocol"). The Parties commit to cooperate in good faith to comply with the provisions of this Stipulation and to comply with all applicable rules, including, but not limited to, the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure. As further set forth in this Stipulation & Order. SO ORDERED. (Signed by Judge Jeannette A. Vargas on 5/20/2025) (sgz) (Entered: 05/20/2025)
